mapper.sql: SELECT C.CMT_NO, E.EMP_NO, C.CMT_SRT, C.CMT_END, C.CMT_RS FROM CMT_AT C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO)
mapper.select: select CMT_NO, EMP_NO, to_char(CMT_SRT, 'hh24:mi:ss') CMT_SRT, to_char(CMT_END, 'hh24:mi:ss') CMT_END , ( select replace((to_char(sum(beh), '09')||':'||to_char(sum(bem),'09')||':'||to_char(sum(bes), '09')),' ', '') from (select extract(HOUR FROM diff) AS beh ,extract(MINUTE FROM diff) AS bem ,extract(SECOND FROM diff) AS bes from (SELECT (be-bs) as diff from (select to_timestamp(to_char(RS_SRT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') bs , to_timestamp(to_char(RS_END, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') be from CMT_RS where EMP_NO =#{emp_no} and CMT_NO = to_number(to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))))) ) as CMT_RS from CMT_AT where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = to_number(to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))

select to_char(extract(HOUR FROM diff), '09') as eh ,to_char(extract(MINUTE FROM diff), '09') as em ,to_char(extract(SECOND FROM diff), '09') as es from(select (atte-atts) as diff from (select rownum, to_timestamp(to_char(CMT_SRT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') atts, to_timestamp(to_char(CMT_END, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') atte from CMT_AT where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = #{thisAttNo}))
select count(CMT_SRT) from CMT_AT where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = to_number(to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
select to_char(CMT_SRT, 'hh24:mi:ss') CMT_SRT from CMT_AT where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = to_number(to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
mapper.update: Update CMT_AT set CMT_END = SYSDATE where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = to_number(to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
Update CMT_RS set RS_END = SYSDATE where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = #{thisAttNo} and RS_END is null
mapper.select: select replace((to_char(sum(beh), '09')||':'||to_char(sum(bem),'09')||':'||to_char(sum(bes), '09')),' ', '') CMT_RS from (select extract(HOUR FROM diff) AS beh ,extract(MINUTE FROM diff) AS bem ,extract(SECOND FROM diff) AS bes from (SELECT (be-bs) as diff from (select to_timestamp(to_char(BR_START, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') bs , to_timestamp(to_char(BR_END, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') be from CMT_RS where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = #{thisAttNo} )))
mapper.update: update CMT_AT set CMT_RS = #{restAll} where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = #{thisAttNo}
mapper.select: select to_char(CMT_END, 'hh24:mi:ss') CMT_END from CMT_AT where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = to_number(to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'))
Select RS_NO , to_char(RS_SRT, 'hh24:mi:ss') RS_SRT from (select * from CMT_RS where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = to_number(to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) order by RS_NO desc) where rownum = 1
mapper.update: Update CMT_RS set RS_END = SYSDATE where RS_NO = #{rs_no} and RS_END is null
mapper.select: select to_char(RS_SRT, 'hh24:mi:ss') RS_SRT, to_char(RS_END, 'hh24:mi:ss') RS_END, CMT_NO from CMT_RS where RS_NO = #{rs_no}

select to_char(sum(beh), '09') eh, to_char(sum(bem), '09') em, to_char(sum(bes), '09') es from (select extract(HOUR FROM diff) AS beh ,extract(MINUTE FROM diff) AS bem ,extract(SECOND FROM diff) AS bes from (SELECT (be-bs) as diff from (select to_timestamp(to_char(RS_SRT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') bs , to_timestamp(to_char(RS_END, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') be from CMT_RS where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and CMT_NO = #{thisAttNo})))
